LanguageData.ATR_SkyMindConnectionFailed: Could not establish SkyMind connection. Check network capacity and availability.
LanguageData.ATR_SkyMindConnectionFailedNoNetwork: Could not establish SkyMind connection. There is no network available.
LanguageData.ATR_GridlockerCleared: The Grid-locker has successfully been decrypted and disabled.
LanguageData.ATR_RemoveCloudPawnSuccess: The neural network of {0} has been removed.
LanguageData.ATR_ReplicateCloudPawnFailed: Could not initiate replication. Insufficient SkyMind space available for allocation.
LanguageData.ATR_OperationInitiated: SkyMind network link established by {0}'s request. Do not disable network connection until procedure is complete.
LanguageData.ATR_OperationCompletedDesc: The SkyMind network has successfully carried out the operation as requested by {0}.
LanguageData.MessageMedicalOperationFailureMinorAndro: {0} committed a minor error while operating and aborted the procedure on {1}.
LanguageData.MessageMedicalOperationFailureCatastroph: {0} has failed catastrophically while attempting an operation on {1}.
LanguageData.MessageMedicalOperationFailureRidiculous: {0} has committed a major error while attempting an operation on {1}.
LanguageData.MessageMedicalOperationFailureFatalAndro: {0} has committed a fatal error while operating on {1} that caused unintentional cascading damage. The procedure caused irreversible damage to the central processor, resulting in total loss of memory and consciousness.
